title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Mozambique 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2022.
The line significantly increased by 4.24 from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum GDP growth compared to previous year, about 6.04 was reported at Year 2020
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 1.8 was reported at Year 2019
